body.name: Glow Recipe Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops Face Serum - Travel Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Skincare Serum, Makeup Primer & Liquid Highlighter for Glowing Skin - Brightening Face Serums (15ml)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 21 mins
features: Instant Dewy Glow - Experience new found hydration and instant glow with our award winning niacinamide serum. A brightening skincare serum + makeup primer hybrid with a dewy, lightweight gel texture. Made without mica, glitter or pearls, revealing immediate illumination and no gray cast.

Replenish Moisture - Containing the holy-grail of hydrators, hyaluronic acid reveals supple, bouncy and dewy skin. Our hydrating serum has a thin, buildable texture, making it suitable for even the most oily skin types.
Promote Smooth, Even Skin - Rich in niacinamide, the breathable formula of our watermelon glow brightening serum helps to revive dullness, minimize the appearance of pores and soothes your skin.

How Do You Dew? - The possibilities are endless with this juicy, watermelon scented facial serum. Incorporate into your skincare regimen, prep & prime your makeup, or use as liquid highlighter on the high points of the face. Our promise is natural, glowing skin, no matter the occasion.

Free Of - We strive in creating a sensorial, enjoyable skincare experience, taking it day by day, skin by skin. Made without Parabens, Mineral Oil, Sulfates, Pthalates, Dry Alcohols and Synthetic Dyes. All of our facial serums amongst all other products, are Vegan & Cruelty-Free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't Go a Day Without This
reviews.reviewText: This is my #1. I'm on my 3rd bottle and I've also gifted this to my husband, SIL, and a few friends. I bought this on a recommendation before the brand became as big as it is now and it transformed my 36 year old skin. I get compliments constantly on how glowy and bright my skin looks--- I was literally in the dentist chair last week getting a chipped tooth fixed and my dentist was like "I'm sorry if this is weird but your skin looks amazing". Can't recommend enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was influenced by this product and it does not disappoint. Has a great sent and feels great on the skin. Great for wear alone or under makeup. It is a bit pricy but so is everything now. It has lasted me a while and will probably end up reordering again. I don't use it everyday but when I do I love it. Great product to add to any routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have pics from January 8th to now February 11th that show such an improvement in my skin. Attached pics show 2/11 and the pics on the right are 1/8.I will say that I see improvement in overall texture, color, wrinkle reduction and brown spot reduction. I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good and works amazing!
reviews.reviewText: This product has made a significant difference in the brightness of my skin. One little pump goes a long way and as soon as it absorbs into the skin you can tell your skin looks more hydrated and brighter. One bottle last a long time and since I’ve started using it I am more confident with my skin without makeup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is my holy grail!!! It’s so good and I would 100% recommend to any skin type. So this product has niacinamide, and it’s known to: control oil production, reduce redness, fade dark spots, AND MOISTURIZE!!! I have combination skin, so my skin is polar opposite like the North and South Poles. Part of my face will be dryer than a desert, while the half produces enough oil to cook 20 piece chicken meal. Having this skin type can be very difficult, as I might find a product that works like a charm to reduce oil, but it may cause the other half of my face to dry out and start peeling. When I tell you that this product was able to control my oil that half of my face was producing WHILE STILL BEING MOISTURIZING!!! NEED I SAY MORE! If you have dark spots all over your face: Glow Recipe - niacinamide dew drops If you have very oily skin that needs controlling: Glow Recipe - niacinamide dew drops If you have dry skin that needs moisturizing AND a product that can be used as a base for makeup (note that it can be used as a primer, but I would still use it with another primer): Glow Recipe - niacinamide dew drops I would recommend this product 100%

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A gently Hydrating Niacinimide
reviews.reviewText: I started out using The Ordinary Niacinimide and while it is really good it is a pretty heavy serum. I did find I had to apply vary sparingly or it would be very tacky for a long time. It also seemed to be a bit irritating since I used it morning and night. These Dew Drops were recommended by a make up influencer so I decided to try it. As someone else mentioned I did find it very sticky and tacky but if I let it sit 20 min or so before applying anything else it has soaked into my skin and is no longer tacky. I am not sure how others use it and put on make up right away. Maybe they have drier skin that soaks it in faster. I only use 1 pump and it goes on so smooth, smells nice and is very hydrating. I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Another Glow Recipe winner! This has the wonderful watermelon scent and amazing texture. I love the way my skin feels after putting it on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You need this
reviews.reviewText: You need Vit C and Hyaluronic in your routine so why not just make it easy and get a bottle that has both? Saves time right?Cute bottle, no-issue pump, nice smell... Slather this all over that lovely face of yours and enjoy bright bold skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It gives you a nice glow

Très bon produit qui s etale facilement sur le visage. Il a plusieurs fonctions. Je l adore, hydratation, glow ...je reviens après un mois d utilisation j'ai des rides qui ont complètement disparu et ma peau est vraiment très joli. Je recommande. C'est sûr que je vais toujours garder ce produit sous la main
It was a dropper and I'm not sure if it is legitimate because I've seen others with a pumpDropper was broken.
